caption:
“Sacrifice sanctifies the soul.”

Reflection:
Every offering refines the heart. In giving what costs us, we draw nearer to the divine.

Commentary:
This reflection reminds us that true holiness is born from self-giving. Sacrifice transforms suffering into love and intention into worship.
